node.title: Significant changes to Finke Desert Race introduced following spectator death
node.alt: motorbikes line up at start line of Finke desert race, bike in front has just taken off
node.description: Permanent changes to entry requirements will herald the end of the NT race's reputation as a unique challenge where rookies can ride alongside some of the biggest names in motorsport.
node.content:
["The organisers of the Finke Desert Race have introduced a suite of changes to the famous event following the death of a spectator this year,", "Nigel Harris died when he was struck by a vehicle that veered off the track while competing in the race in June.\u00a0", "Twenty-seven\u00a0people were hospitalised with injuries sustained at the race weekend this year, with eight people medically evacuated from Alice Springs to Adelaide.\u00a0", "Permanent changes to entry requirements now herald the end of the race's reputation as a unique challenge where rookies can ride alongside some of the biggest names in motorsport.\u00a0", "\"We used to be quite proud of the fact that anybody could get a licence and could compete in our event,\" Finke Desert Race President Antony Yoffa said.", "\"The average, everyday punter could race against the country's best, or arguably the world's best.\u00a0", "\"The level and standard of the competition has gone up, the speed has gone up, the deterioration of the track is quite marked.", "", "
Finke race president Antony Yoffa says there will be new entry requirements for the race.(ABC Alice Springs: Saskia Mabin)
", "
Experienced riders only, and no quad bikes
", "The annual two-day off-road event \u2014\u00a0which is billed as 'Australia's greatest desert race' \u2014\u00a0started in 1976 as a challenge for local motorbike riders from Alice Springs to race\u00a0to the small community of Aputula (Finke) and back.\u00a0", "In recent years, the event has attracted more than 600 competitors in the bike category and approximately 150 cars.", "", "
Canberra retiree Nigel Harris died when he was hit by a vehicle that left the track while competing.(Supplied: Sheryl Harris)
", "From next year, all entrants in both the bike and car categories must have either competed in the Finke Desert Race before or participated in a similar off-road race.", "Mr Yoffa said that would have a significant impact on the bike race, where 50 per cent of competitors each year were \"first-timers.\"", "Prospective competitors will be allowed to apply for special dispensation if they fall outside of this criteria, and those applications will be assessed on a case-by-case basis by the race committee.\u00a0", "Quad bikes will be also eliminated from the event.", "Mr Yoffa said the Finke Desert Race had an exemption to allow quad bikes to race alongside other bikes, which ordinarily would not be allowed, but it had become too difficult to keep them separate.\u00a0\u00a0", "", "
Investigations into spectator Nigel Harris's death are ongoing.(ABC Alice Springs:\u00a0Samantha Jonscher)
", "
Improved safety for spectators
", "Mr Yoffa says\u00a0there will\u00a0also be a \"considerable number of changes\" to how the race can be viewed by the thousands of spectators that flock to camp alongside the\u00a0230-kilometre desert track.", "Mr Yoffa said there would be marked exclusion zones along the track and that the race committee had received legal advice that additional fencing and signage was needed.", "An independent\u00a0medical director, who will oversee the event, will be appointed on the recommendation of Motorsport Australia.\u00a0", "The governing body's director, Michael Smith, said that recommendation was not directly linked to Mr Harris's death, or the number of serious injuries sustained by competitors.\u00a0", "Motorsport Australia will also hire an additional person with a \"very specialist and unique set of skills\" to assist local event organisers with running the event.\u00a0", "", "
Six months on from the fatal crash, investigations are continuing into Mr Harris' death(ABC Alice Springs:\u00a0Samantha Jonscher)
", "Mr Smith said it was still \"to early\" to comment on Motorsport Australia's investigation into Mr Harris's death at the 2021 event.", "NT Police said its\u00a0separate investigation\u00a0was also ongoing.\u00a0", "The 2022 Finke Desert Race is scheduled to take place on\u00a0June 9-13, 2022.\u00a0"]
